response.original_title: Beatrix Potter: Artist, Storyteller, And Countrywoman
response.overview: This documentary film about the life of the remarkable author and illustrator of THE TALE OF PETER RABBIT, is based on the successful biography, BEATRIX POTTER: ARTIST, STORYTELLER AND COUNTRYWOMAN by Judy Taylor.
response.tagline: This documentary film about the life of the remarkable author and illustrator of THE TALE OF PETER RABBIT, is based on the successful biography, BEATRIX POTTER: ARTIST, STORYTELLER AND COUNTRYWOMAN by Judy Taylor.
response.title: Beatrix Potter: Artist, Storyteller, And Countrywoman
